WorkItem.Description:
The 'Show Pending Updates' feature doesn't use provided credentials and lead to an 'Unauthorized access Exception' error when used from a account that have not admin privilege on the remote computer.
The feature need to be execute from an account that have admin privilege on the remote computer to work.

Comments.Message:
Changing the way of 'FrmShowPendingUPdates' is launch so that it can be run with other credentials.
(1.1.1304.14)
